description: Details of condition 4 (construction management plan) and 5 (construction logistics plan) pursuant to planning application reference 16/0098/FULOPDC for change of use of existing general industrial floorspace, construction of extensions comprising infill extension at ground to third floor levels, new mezzanine levels, front entrance porch, cycle store, bin store and 4x plant enclosures to building roof and at ground floor level with new plant equipment, and associated alterations to the elevations and site layout.
decision_conditions: The Council is satisfied that the proposal would not be likely to represent a direct conflict with Ealing Council's strategic plan for the borough and as such would advise the Old Oak and Park Royal Development Corporation (OPDC) to continue to determine the details of condition 4 (construction management plan) and condition 5(construction logistics plan) with regard to the Adopted Development Plan, Core Strategy, the draft Local Plan (OPDC) and other relevant statutory guidance. | The applicant is advised that the following comment has been received from the London Borough of Ealing - Transport Department and should be considered:
o	The applicant needs to engage a road sweeper that can attend site within 3 hours
o	Deliveries should seek to avoid the morning and evening peak period.
o	The applicant should state the maximum number of lorry movements per hour and over the entire day
o	No construction vehicles should park or wait on the public highway.
o	Transport would recommend that construction lorries use the most direct route to the A40, via Gypsy Corner or via Old Oak Common.
